unnormalised: Last year, for my parents' 25th anniversary, we preponed our trip to Vaishno Devi. My mom always wanted to visit, and since she wasn't in the best health, we booked a helicopter. The package from Jammu cost us Rs. 6,000 per person. We reached Bhavan around 2 PM after waiting for like, 3 hrs. The darshan was beautiful. Afterward, we had a simple, but delicious, vegetarian meal at a nearby bhandara, paid â‚¹200 for prasad, and headed back to Katra by 8 PM. It was a hectic but fulfilling pilgrimage.
normalised: Last year, for my parents' twenty fifth anniversary, we preponed our trip to Vaishno Devi. My mom always wanted to visit, and since she wasn't in the best health, we booked a helicopter. The package from Jammu cost us rupees six thousand per person. We reached Bhavan around two P M after waiting for like, three hours. The darshan was beautiful. Afterward, we had a simple, but delicious, vegetarian meal at a nearby bhandara, paid rupee two hundred for prasad, and headed back to Katra by eight P M. It was a hectic but fulfilling pilgrimage.
